page.title: 04Davidston Farm.
page.content: Davidston Farm lies south east of Newtyle.Mr.J.Dunbar is the tenant farmer.He has 130{Hereford}and {Charollais}bullocks.He buys them as calves and keeps them to fatten.He keeps them inside for two winters and they are fed on{hay,silage and turnips which he grows.He sells them at McDonald Fraser's market in Perth.He rears{turkeys. } He also grows{barley,potatoes}and {oilseed rape. }These are cash crops His barley is made into whisky.Oilseed rape has bright yellow flowers and the seeds are crushed for oil.The oil is used for cooking.He has one small wood of{conifer trees. } He has tractors,a combine,a bailer, trailers,ploughs and harrows.He has two working sons.He employs part-time workers to dress the potatoes.(Derek Robertson P7)
